events.comment: Explode, Param: X, Y, Range, Damage, shake magnitude, shake duration. (TODO animation options)
spawn a ring of bullets, Param: X, Y, Shake magnitude, Shake duration
Creates a damage counter text (does not only support numbers as text) then moves it up and fades, destroys after. Param: X, Y, Text

action.name: Set text
action.param: "C: " & Cityblock.Count & " W:" & FixedCity.Width & " H:" & FixedCity.Height & " CO:" & CollisionBox.Count & " MEM:" & ImageMemoryUsage
